sentences.en: A good deal of housework can be mechanized.
sentences.cn: 大量家务活可用机械化操作.

sentences.en: He always helps with the housework.
Her sons were experts at getting out of housework.
sentences.cn: 她的儿子们很会逃避家务活.
家务活做起来真是没完没了。

sentences.en: Housework is negatively valued as a retreat from a disliked alternative — employment work.
sentences.cn: 家务劳动给消极地看作是逃避不喜欢的另一种选择——受雇工作.

sentences.en: Housework is usually miscellaneous and toilsome.
sentences.cn: 家务劳动通常是繁杂的.

sentences.en: How much do men share housework and the care of the children?
sentences.cn: 男人分担多少家务和照看小孩的工作？

sentences.en: I indulged in an orgy of housework.
sentences.cn: 我整天埋在干不完的家务活儿里.

sentences.en: Men are doing more housework nowadays.
sentences.cn: 现今男人正在承担越来越多的家务。
许多现代发明便利了家务劳动.

sentences.en: She hasn't been feeling well lately and she let the housework slide.
sentences.cn: 她近来一直感到不适,对家务也就随它去了.

sentences.en: She is so particular about her housework that servants will not work for her.
sentences.cn: 她对家务活太挑剔了,以致于佣人们不愿给她干活.

sentences.en: She spends her day doing housework, watching television, reading, and so on.
sentences.cn: 她以做家务 、 看电视 、 看书等等度过一天.

sentences.en: There is a maid to do the housework.
You can really work up a sweat doing housework.
sentences.cn: 做家务真的会让人大汗淋漓。

trans.tran_en: work that you do to take care of a house, for example washing, cleaning etc
